kaninator.game
Class Zombie

java.lang.Object
  kaninator.game.Zombie

public class Zombie
extends java.lang.Object

The main enemy class of the game. The Zombies contain model objects which represent them on screen. They can also perform rudimentary AI, trying to flock up on the player.

Author:
phedman

Constructor Detail

Zombie

public Zombie(java.util.ArrayList<Animation> animations,
              Map _map,
              SoundClip _squirt,
              DynamicObject _player,
              double x,
              double y,
              double radius_constant)
       throws java.lang.Exception
Constructs a Zombie object and initializes all the objects it is dependent on.

Parameters:
animations - The ArrayList of Animations that build up the Zombie model. Cannot be null or of the size 0.
_map - The game map used for height checking.
_squirt - The sound to be played when the Zombie is hit by a bullet.
_player - The player object the Zombies are chasing.
x - The starting x coordinate for the player.
y - The starting y coordinate for the player.
radius_constant - How much the width of the Animations should be divided with to get a realistic estimate for the radius of the model.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Exception If the animation is null or of the size 0, since the Model object cannot be created without these.
Method Detail

distanceTo

private double distanceTo(DynamicObject other)
Calculates the distance between the Zombie and the DynamicObject in the parameter

Parameters:
other - The DynamicObject the distance will be calculated to.
Returns:
The distance between the Zombie and the DynamicObject in the parameter.

follow

private void follow(DynamicObject target)
Makes the >ombie follow the DynamicObject set as the target. Doesn't perform pathfinding or anything fancy, just brute force following, even if a wall is in the way.

Parameters:
target - The DynamicObject the Zombie should follow.

observe

public void observe()
Calculates the distance between the Zombie and the player and stores it in order to be able to compare distances with its peers later on.

kill

public void kill()
Kills the Zombie. Effectively setting the dead value to true and playing the squish sound.

act

public boolean act(java.util.LinkedList<Zombie> others)
Performs the actions the Zombie should do. If the Zombie is already dead it returns true so the Zombie can be removed from the list in Game. The Zombie is inactive if the distance to the player is less than MAX_ACTIVE_DISTANCE, otherwise it compares the distances to the player with its peers and then mimics the Zombie with the closest distance to the player.

Parameters:
others - The other Zombies the Zombie collaborates with.
Returns:
true if the Zombie is dead, otherwise false.

getMainObject

public DynamicObject getMainObject()
Getter for the DynamicObject representing the Zombie.

Returns:
The DynamicObject representing the Zombie.

getDynamicObjects

public java.util.LinkedList<DynamicObject> getDynamicObjects()
Gets all the DynamicObjects associated with the Zombie. Ie. The Zombie model itself and its shadow.

Returns:
A LinkedList of all the DynamicObjects associated with the Zombie.
